abstract: Tim Burton, the artist and filmmaker, will be adding his creepy stamp to the Macy's Thanksgiving Day Parade.
snippet: Tim Burton, the artist and filmmaker, will be adding his creepy stamp to the Macy's Thanksgiving Day Parade.
lead_paragraph: Halloween may be just around the corner, but it's another holiday, Thanksgiving, that's looking spooky.

headline.main: Tim Burton Balloon to Spook Macy's Parade
